website_summaries.verdict: Another affordable pick showcasing remarkable versatility and overall comfort.
pros: Collar is adjustable for supreme comfort
Thick neoprene keeps users warm in cooler waters
cons: Some buyers had issues with shipping

customer_reviews.title: Order a size or two up, otherwise AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall quality of the product and it's a good price point compared to others that I have seen, however like some of the other reviews stated it's simply smaller than the sizing chart. I understand of course it's going to be skin tight (obviously) but if you order based on the sizing chart you will most likely end up with something too small. I'm 6ft, 38" waist, 215lbs and the XL was too tight for me. I was very impressed with the velcro, it held extremely well, the zipper was also on point.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These suits DO NOT run small! The sizing chart available in the website is 100% accurate. It's suppose to be tight. I went XL (6'1" & 198#) based in the the fact everyone was saying the run small and it's a bit too large. Should work fine because I'm slowly getting fat. Now about the suit... It's just fine. That's it, fine. It's lightweight, quality zipper but the velco seems low quality and the cuffs should be tighter. The fold over for the neck cuff is bulky and pokes the back of your head when you're paddling. That being said. It's exactly what I expected for the price point. I would purchase again and also recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Gelles

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 ft tall, 230 pounds (52 year old who likes to eat, not an athlete), and I normally do fine in an XXL wetsuit - this one would not fit at all - bottom part was fine but shoulders and chest no way - could not zip even with someone helping me. Not a matter of going to the XXXL because that would be too big on the bottom - just an unusually sized wetsuit - would recommend trying it on somewhere before buying. I have had several Hyperflex wetsuits over the years and they are great products - no performance issues with them ever. This particular model just fits weird.
customer_reviews.author: jerwelch

customer_reviews.title: Good fit per hyperflex size guide
customer_reviews.text: Super nice for the price. My 14 year old is about 5 10’’ and 135lbs broad soldiers. we went with adult small, per hyperflex sizing. . He wears adult small/ medium. He was a little weirded out by what he described as “too much definition” around his private area...but it didn’t seem that way, maybe just teenage anxiety lol. No issues with sandrash around neckline like with precious wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Resolve for my First Tri
customer_reviews.text: Had my first tri this weekend and this was so perfect for the event! Since it was lake swimming vs. ocean a full wetsuit would have been too much. Its fairly true to size (as you want wetsuits to fit snug). I'm 5"7 ...140lb (Athletic build) and ordered a size 8. It was a bit snug at first but stretched to form perfectly. If you want a spring suit this is an AMAZING deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mims5679

customer_reviews.title: new spring suit
customer_reviews.text: .....while this east coast suit maker is fairly new to the west coasters they still need alot of design feedback. the suit is very well made well priced and good looking. the sizing chart is way small, esp chest and arms they blow it on the neck/collar. its way too thin, too short,doesnt close, water will come in at the zipper every duck dive and theres too much velcro making it difficult to undo.redesign the neck/collar and we'll have a winner.......
customer_reviews.author: Bird Rock Soul

customer_reviews.title: Great wet suit value.
customer_reviews.text: Great, super flexible super comfy wet suite. Purchased for our 10 year old who's bigger than most his age. We're headed to Cozumel for scuba and snorkeling and he needed a wet suit. I wished I'd have bought this for me vs the Phantom I bought last year. Will likely purchase one for me when the phantom is done.
customer_reviews.author: mdisher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fits well
customer_reviews.text: My first wetsuit. I am 5'4 and 118 pound with a small waist. I bought a 6. It fits well and tight so no water will get in. Quality is great! For anyone with wider hips I would recommend a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Silvana Opp

customer_reviews.title: It went on easily and was easy to zip up with the long ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore it over my bathing suit. It went on easily and was easy to zip up with the long zipper cord. Got to the lake and walked right it. It was the first time I've ever worn a wet suit and was very pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to get right in the water with no chill at all. Highly recommend this from a person with little experience.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Serves well
customer_reviews.text: Fits good on me. I wear a medium in rash guards so Medium works well for me on this suit. Great for the price. It's durable and keeps you warm for those still chilly spring days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the comfort and fit to her body despite not on the sexy side. She can easily moves around due to the wetsuit flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer

customer_reviews.title: These suits are better tight, anyways
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of listening to everyone else saying that this suit runs small, so I ordered a size up from my street clothes and it was too big. It's true that the arms are very tight, but everything else is true to size. If you spend some time in it, it will stretch to your form. These suits are better tight, anyways, to keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: This fit me perfectly! Love it but will wear something to cover elbos and knees like a skin cause I just like the coverage protection. I really like the ability to get it on and off faster than the long sleeved and long legged ones! Am very pleased with this shorty. It did not cover but half my theigh.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Sue

customer_reviews.title: I really like this spring suit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to get in/out, very comfortable in temps down to about 63, then a bit cool but still better than nothing. The only thing I don't like is there is no flap inside the back zipper like on higher end suits, so cold water trickles in and down my back.
customer_reviews.author: MSB 90266

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of neoprene...very stiff fors not strecth on shoulder
customer_reviews.text: The design of this suit is ok...but the quality of the neoprene used is terrible...the lowest quality I have seen....vrry stiff and does not strecth...I guess that Yu get for $70
customer_reviews.author: gilles baudin

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and I think it will be perfect for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up! I am 5'7, 130, thin, fit. I ordered a size 10. It feels a tiny bit tight but I have only put it on once and have not gotten in the water yet. Quality is great and I think it will be perfect for the sprint tri's I will do this summer.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on (easier than much, much bigger sizes of the similar O'Neill Reactor), looks great, size chart seems correct, kept me comfortable in cold water.
customer_reviews.author: GCD

customer_reviews.title: Great suit but runs small...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, but be aware if your a XL get a xXXL it runs small. So order two sizes up. Well made and nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for a limber adult to get in & out ...
customer_reviews.text: Request for review is premature as suit hasn't been tested in cold water. Previous reviewers gave acceptable guidance on sizing, however the item has a label with an extremely detailed size chart & I cannot imagine why that information is not posted to take the effort & anxiety out of guessing size. As tested thus far, item fits snuggly, which is the intent. 5'11", 175 lbs, 40 - 42 chest is a Large. Chest is tight but not overly restrictive. Not too bad for a limber adult to get in & out of. Kids & others will need help with zipper & velcro located on upper back. Dries reasonably quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Inspiration Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, good design and better price. First hyperflex I've owned and if the other lines are half as good at this ACCESS 2.5mm, won't be the last.
customer_reviews.author: Watts Family

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered an XL, I am 6'0 185 and it fit very well. I tried 3 other shorties from other mfgs and none of them worked.
customer_reviews.author: AlC

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: . Fit as just expected, size 10 being slightly loose, as planned, for a regularly size 6 woman. Nice quality. Very comfortable. My wife has worn this regularly for cooler late summer waters.
customer_reviews.author: Warren K.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third purchase of this suit. Runs a bit small so I order a size up each year for my son. He uses it for tubing and wake boarding at the lake. My son is 9 years old, size 18 and tall! Great suit for a solid guy. He puts this on over his swimsuit with ease.
customer_reviews.author: bbg

customer_reviews.title: WATCH THE SIZES!
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is a joke. I am not a small women (5'8" 145lb) but a 14 would not even fit a little. Quality was ok. Zipper worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Upper body a little tight
customer_reviews.text: just to help other possible buyers the upper body fit is very tight....i am 5'6" and 150 lbs and it is small on the upper body. Other than that it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to order the correct size!
customer_reviews.text: Great wet suit for the money. EXL is very snug on me. 5'11" 200 lbs. probably would opt for next size up. Glad my wife is around to squeeze me in and out!
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wetsuit. I’m a “fluffy” person and this fit perfect!!! Just enough give to be comfortable, but snug enough to be just what you need in a wetsuit. Also I want to add that I have seen reviews not just about this suit but about shirts that were made by this company and I have no bad odor of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: J. Srebro

customer_reviews.title: Received what was advertised and ordered. Thanks. Really ...
customer_reviews.text: Received what was advertised and ordered. Thanks. Really need much more comprehensive sizing charts. Include Croth-to-shoulder measurement, hips, waist, chest, shoulder, end-of-leg to crotch.
customer_reviews.author: John Bennett

customer_reviews.title: She loved the feel in the water
customer_reviews.text: True size. Very strong construction. She loved the feel in the water. Kept the body warm for a longer period.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my grandson. He is a tall, think 15 YO boy and the size men's small fit him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable, spring suit!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad, and he has loved it! Size is pretty true and he has had no problems :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'6" 145, athletic fit, 36B, small hips. I ordered a size 8. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: grahamje

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality..like others say..runs a little small.. sleeves are a little small.. good freedom of arm movements..
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Happy and warm
customer_reviews.text: If you get cold swimming, snorkeling, diving in Hawaii during Nov-Feb, then this is for you ladies. Keeps you happy playing in the water for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great for pools in Wisconsin
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about a swimming pool in Wisconsin is the 3 months of the year it can be used. This wetsuit lets me swim on days I wouldn't want to, and even on really hot days I still prefer it over a standard swimsuit. Can't beat if for the price
customer_reviews.author: David Krumwiede

customer_reviews.title: The Seller is good and send the product on time but I returned ...
customer_reviews.text: The Seller is good and send the product on time but I returned it as it runs small and the quality was not super great
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gevorkyan

customer_reviews.title: Read measurements for sz8
customer_reviews.text: I have only tried it on, not used it for swimming yet. Bought a sz 8, my measurements are: 5'6", 136lbs, thighs where suit ends 19,5inch, arms where suit ends 9,8inch It fits me perfect everywhere besides arms and thighs, it's a bit to snug. I'm affraid a sz up will be to much, since it's perfect everywhere else? It feels really thick, I would say it's a fall/winter/spring suit, whitout having tried it yet. I'll update my review when I have. So far I'm thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Chdyb

customer_reviews.title: thickness great for late spring early fall while NE water is ...
customer_reviews.text: fit slightly snug. should have went one size higher from size chart. thickness great for late spring early fall while NE water is still kind of warm
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: This is gorgeous. Does run a size smaller. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous. Does run a size smaller. I'm on vacation so I lost a bit of weight, it's starting to fit now LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Nazia

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she loves it. Wears it over her swimsuit no problem. I bought a sizer bigger than normal. She wears it for tubing in the lake.
customer_reviews.author: bbg

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery, wonderful wetsuit, size was perfect for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little tight, but it may be to my overweight, ja
customer_reviews.author: OCL

customer_reviews.title: but very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fits smaller than your normal wear, but very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: leimomii

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Good material. Sizes run small more so in the chest area. Had to reorder next size up. Fit is good still small around arms and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Wetherell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and stretchy. Bought it to wear in the Pacific while Kayaking on the Central coast.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Weinfeld

customer_reviews.title: Useless for a male!
customer_reviews.text: The wetsuit's materials and quality are fine but the size of chest and shoulders is too small and doesn't match the size of hips and legs. It seems to be cut for women.
customer_reviews.author: rafael quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Floats nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely bought it to train and swim in for my first triathlon. Worked great made me float like a champ and beat my friends who had fancy triathlon wet suits!
customer_reviews.author: kyle h

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like but have not used it much. Some day
customer_reviews.author: Sean Abernathy Sr

customer_reviews.title: My own fault for not reading the size chart properly
customer_reviews.text: Suit is well made; it is too bad the biggest size is too small for me (50" chest, 42" waist).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within 2 weeks of actual use. Do not ...
customer_reviews.text: Ripped within 2 weeks of actual use. Do not Buy. I dont ever post comments but this one is trash
customer_reviews.author: Juhyeon Koh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit good. Came in very handy this summer when practicing in 69% water
customer_reviews.author: Yoda

customer_reviews.title: Good spring suit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. Good buy for the price. Arrived in timely manner as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poorly fitting wetsuit
customer_reviews.text: Poorly fitting wetsuit, too tight in the shoulders too big in the legs. Returned to Amazon at great expense. Never buy a wetsuit online!
customer_reviews.author: Bill MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good suit for moderately cold water. Easy in and out.
customer_reviews.author: D.R. Leo

customer_reviews.title: Redy for Maui
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be just what I will need for Maui. Glad I ordered one size larger, fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Too short, the fitting guide doesn't represent the real ...
customer_reviews.text: Too short, the fitting guide doesn't represent the real sizes. It was suppose to be big enough for me according to the fitting guide. please let me know how to change it for a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sout!
customer_reviews.text: It's just fine for me. I feel a little bit tie because I'm on the edge of the size but its a good material and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: fits very small
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits incredibly tight. I ordered one size up and it was way too small so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: William Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe I scored this awesome suit for under $40!!! It is well made and fits great. I am 5'8" and weigh 195lbs and I got the 2x. It fits snug but not too tight. I suggest getting a size larger than other suits. Keeps me warm in mid 60s water. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Camera

customer_reviews.title: good zipeers all around great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Size was true, good zipeers all around great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great, but smaller
customer_reviews.text: The suit is great though smaller than the marked size.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo E. Francos

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small ONLY 2MM NOT 2.5MM
customer_reviews.text: NOT 2.5 MM ONLY 2MM!!!This suit definitely runs small I own a Hyperflex full length 5/4 suit for cold weather kitesurfing in a size 10, so I also bought this in a 10 since it's the same brand ...I barley got it on,maybe this is junior size? Or shorty suits run a size smaller then full length suits not sure either way order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: j9

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of the sizes - does not fit as suggested
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered a size 4, which was way too small. She returned this and ordered a size 6, which was also too small. It is too constrictive in the legs and waist. And no, she is not a large woman, she is 5' tall and weighs 98 lbs. Not sure how they're sizing these, but be careful. She wears a size "0" dress and we're having to return a size "6" wetsuit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Senior

customer_reviews.title: Fit was good. I'm a 42 regular in suit terms and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good. I'm a 42 regular in suit terms and I went with the large and this fit really well. Not too tight and not too loose, just right. Quality seems good as well. I have only used it once, but I see no reason why I won't be able to use it again and again. If you are a hard core athlete, this might not be the wetsuit for you. But if you are only going to be doing the occassional triathlon, this is definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: bitterpete

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It's a great fit and was perfect for my first sprint triathlon. I plan to use it for more water activities.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT, FITS PERFECTLY.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have time to review this at the time that i used it so my review is a little late. I purchased this to go on a trip to the islands. This wetsuit was perfect. It kept my body nice and warm in the cold waters. Also the suit fit perfectly to my body, it felt great on my arms and legs. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a wetsuit at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I bougth this wetsuit after look for something similar in a local store. I tried the same size in a different brand and was perfect but this wetsuit is too small... I compared it with another one size 4 from a friend and were the same. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanoi

product_meta.title: HYPERFLEX Men's and Women's 2.5mm Shorty Springsuit Wetsuit – SURFING, Water Sports, Scuba Diving, Snorkeling - Comfort, Flexible, Anatomical Fit, Adjustable Collar
product_meta.description: The Hyperflex Access 2.5 mm men's short-sleeve springsuit is a wetsuit designed to cater to the needs of the entry-level surfer. The flatlock seams offer reliable durability and strength. It's also crafted with a comfortable, anatomically cut pattern, an adjustable collar, and a beefy YKK zipper.
feature_bullets: Anatomically cut pattern and adjustable neck
Flex cuff leg openings and Seamless underarm gussets
NEW TECHNOLOGY: Using mesh-skin chest and back panels to increase the wind/water repellency and insulation for surfers in all climates.
SURF WETSUIT: Designed for a new surfer that offers amazing value without sacrificing quality.
DURABLE: Low profile flatlock seam for maximum durability and strength.
KNEE PROTECTION: Knees are reinforced with a Duratex outer lining for improved longevity and protection.
FEATURES: Stainless steel zipper slider with a comfortable adjustable collar.
